name: Cherish Longaberger
text: Great pizza! We were visiting from out of state and our friend took us here for lunch. Now I‚Äôm sad we don‚Äôt have one here locally it was fantastic!

name: Forest Service
text: My pizza was mediocre. The base was not very good,  kind of dowey. The toppings are good toppings...they just didn't complement each other. Iv had much better pizza at 2 thirds the price. For that price I'd expect the best pizza iv ever had. I'm not going back.

name: Echo Striebig
text: Shared three pizzas and the pretzel bites with my family and it was all just fantastic! Oh and don‚Äôt get me started on how amazing the staff was; they‚Äôre truly the best there! We were told the pizza would be the best we‚Äôd ever had, and ‚Ä¶More

the spoon measurement depicted in this photos may give vision to what influences this 3star review.

name: Alberto Daniel
text: I ordered a pizza online yesterday 12pm. After 30 minutes, I parked my car for the curbside pick up and called them and heard that my order is ready and would bring the pizza soon. I waited for 10 minutes and called again, and heard that ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim O'Sullivan
text: We love Mellow Mushroom! We visited on a very rainy night and as a result it was very quiet, but that was perfect for us! Portions were generous and very reasonably priced. Service was good as expected. Street parking can be a challenge in Blacksburg, but the Kent Square garage is exactly opposite. Recommended!

name: Kymn Davidson-Hamley
text: Safe place to eat during COVID19, with delicious food. Has gluten free options which is nice. Cool vibes and courteous staff!

name: Jordan Rudman
text: Food and service are both good. The atmosphere is fun and there are plenty of TVs. Nice place to watch VT football games!

name: Elle Smith
text: The staff is ready for any craziness... especially game day! Love the environment and the food is to die for. Busy, but the wait time is not long at all.

name: Jessi Hurt
text: Service was great and the restaurant was clean and comfortable!  Very happy with our evening out to Mellow Mushroom!

name: JAMES NEWCOMB
text: Great staff and great service. Pizzas are great but their sandwiches are flavorless. I would just stick to their pizzas. All in all a great hangout!

name: Alexander McMahon
text: Absolutely love this place! Love how they are handling curbside since the pandemic. Great location. Great food! From state to state they stay consistent with taste  would reccomend everytime

name: David Lee Hopkins
text: Had a large party - 8 adults, 2 kids. Kennedy was our server. Great service and the food came out quickly and was delicious. Appetizers were spinach dip and the pretzel dough bites. I ordered the Thai Chili wings and my two closest ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Nguyen
text: Pricey for pizza but very tasty...good date night pizza!

name: Joel Shaffran
text: The pizza was very overpriced. The crust was too doughy, no crispness whatsoever, unable to support the weight of the toppings, absolutely way too thin. The selection of toppings are nice, but at $2.00 per topping my 14" pie ended up costing $25, WOW...insane. Will never eat here again. My server was very nice however.

name: Vtwigger
text: Good Pizza, my wife and I shared the great white. The large is plenty for 2 people. Lots of beer on tap. Nice seating, private booths and window seat. Good outdoor seating in the warmer months.  Great service too!

name: Thomas Perini
text: Great place to go with friends, staff was friendly and pizzas were fresh.

name: Christopher Urbane
text: Great pizza as usual although a bit pricey. Amazing enough, we ordered two pizzas for pickup and they were ready in twenty minutes!

name: Jason Clendenin
text: Great pizza. Great staff. Great draft....... Firestone Walker Double Jack IPA is awesome!!!

name: Nadia Trampert
text: Great management and wonderful staff! Every thing was beyond expectation! Even though it was a busy Friday night they managed the restaurant wonderfully! Highly recommend!

name: Walter Pirie
text: I rarely eat pizza but enjoy a good one. When friends suggested Mellow Mushroom after a meeting  I was happy to tag along. There were 8 of us. I had plans for the evening but figured I could afford an hour for pizza and friendship. Well, It ‚Ä¶More

name: HR Representative
text: Had friendly and fast service while visiting Mellow Mushroom. My server was extremely friendly in providing me suggestions in sampling their craft beer selection. I go back and enjoy a meal and cold beer every time I visit Blacksburg, VA.

name: Crystal D
text: Mellow is always a good idea. Great food, great service, fantastic beer selection.

name: Michael Wagnon
text: With order confusion, they did a great job getting things back on track in a timely manner.

name: alicia Gorur
text: Wonderful place to eat!!!!! I am a Vegan, so you already know I'm strict and overbearing. Our waiter was so patient... and was able to substitute out things for me! I ordered the Avocado Hoagie, without mayo and ‚Ä¶More

name: J Q
text: Great pizza.  Nice outside patio.

name: Hannah Winistorfer
text: Excellent service,drinks and food. Will be going back!

name: Melissa Bader
text: Casey was great, my son enjoyed the teriyaki tofu.

name: james grindstaff
text: The absolute best pizza out side of Chicago. The decor is equally impressive. Wish we had a mellow mushroom in Las Vegas.

name: Noah Provenzano
text: Very, very delicious pizza. You pay for what you get and it's a tad more expensive than any other pizza place in Blacksburg. It's perfect for any date.

name: Kevin Phillips
text: In my opinion this mellow mushroom is top rated . Quality and fresh food. Very clean and friendly atmosphere.  Always a  pleasant dining experience

name: Randall Moore
text: Good food and services.

name: Oni Thompson
text: It's cool af

name: Daniel Kirkpatrick
text: If you are a mushroom lover and love pizzas, then this place is for you. The pizzas are so tasty, you won't notice the student crowd.

name: Alison M
text: Such a cool place. The pizza is a little expensive but very good. We were able to park a two minute's walk away.   The industrial look is very memorable and it's cool watching them make your pizza. Overall a nice place to go.

name: Deborah Osborne
text: Awesome food and service!!

name: Austin
text: I guess 45 minutes for an appetizer is to be expected on a game night. But they have THE best napkins.

name: Morgan Collier
text: Service was bad. Food quality not worth the price. My food came out in 5 min and my friends literally waited 20 min for their foodm..the server wasnt even around to bring it our when it was ready so another server was trying to figure out ‚Ä¶More

name: Roger Robertson
text: Clean. Friendly. Moderately priced, yet reasonable for the venue. Pleasant environment. Popular with college aged adults.

name: Bridget Neal
text: Parking is a pain. Right in the heart of college town. Great pizza. Friendly service.

name: Dustin Kirby
text: Manager Brad was so nice! Pizza was excellent! Great atmosphere!

name: Ryan Hatfield
text:
I hate paper straws! No other option.
A plastic fork and knife would have been way better than the dollar tree silverware they provide. The food and service was ok, nothing special.

name: Aaron Keller
text: Love mellow mushroom. The holy shiitake pie is the best, if you havent tried it you must get it! Best üçï!

name: Jennifer McCord
text: Very slow service, too expensive, and food that comes out burned more than half the time. I wouldn't recommend it unless you have food allergies, which they are very good about accommodating.

name: Jd Meredith
text: Food was very good as always very good service

name: Lisa Sutphin
text:
Food was really good
service was okay.

name: Samantha Santti
text: Orders apps and pizzas, all was amazing! Service was great, server was very knowledgeable. Really cool atmosphere

name: Clinton Wells
text: My wife and I ordered pizzas to go, but we wish we would have just gone here to eat. This place has awesome seating and a sweet bar with plenty on tap. All the staff seemed friendly as well.

name: Brandon A
text: Veggie and pepperoni pizza! Wonderful taste, environment, and service! Will come again!

name: Amy Harrison
text: I love Mellow Mushroom, they're Thai dye pizza is sooooo good. Of all the times I've been there, it's been great save one time. Once, a large service mishap happened with my order, and I was so hangry by the end I straight snapped and ‚Ä¶More

name: Jack
text: Usually we eat SALS in Radford, but decided to try Mellow Mushroom in Blacksburg. VT is still on break, so there was no wait or traffic. The food was delicious, service was fast, and Atmosphere is fun. Will definitely be back when we‚Äôre in town. So far the best pizza I‚Äôve tried since moving back to VA.

name: Scott McCrickard
text: A good place with interesting pizza selections and great outdoor seating right on Main Street.  There's a solid selection of beer and other drinks as well. It's a bit pricey but worth it on the right occasion.

name: Andrew Miller
text: Never had a problem with mellow, but recently I placed an order for take out online. ‚Ä¶More

name: Katherine Herdt
text: Best pizza in town! Although a little pricey

name: Polina Gashnikova
text: Waited an hour for drinks, more than an hour for food. Our server messed up everything from our order to checks. Horrible place for big parties. Manager unsuccessfully attempted to help with three cups of tator tots. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Garnett
text: Great food specials!!! $5.00 pizzas!!!! Awesome crust!

name: wendi porter
text: Amazing pizza and a family friendly atmosphere. The kid's mac and cheese came out way too hot though. My little guy burned his mouth.

name: Saksham Goyal
text: Great food, but lines are long as prices are a little high

name: Charles Lowe
text: Food great,waiter was awesome!! Wait was long and searing could have been better but will ear there again!@

name: Jimmy Holland
text: Food is always quality and the drink selection is above average. Service in Blacksburg is very, very slow. While the lunch pricing is very reasonable, the wait for food, processing of the bill, etc yields a very drawn out lunch break. A great place for a relaxing evening but we'll definitely be headed elsewhere for lunches.

name: Erin Rusch
text: We had an enjoyable lunch. I decided to try their new pizza in the menu while my boyfriend ordered a large cheese pizza with mushrooms. Everything was prepared fresh and was tasty. The service was good too. Will definitely visit this place again in the near future.

name: Simply Sassy Sarah
text: Good food!

name: Ralph Albrecht
text: Great pizza including gluten free pizza. Ordered a bunch for takeout for a business meeting.

name: Cam Mur
text: Love there pies good service and I like paper straws

name: Reformed Wooden Creations
text: Amazing food, super friendly service, awesome design and decoration. Old school, steam punk, rustic mix. Cant wait to go back

name: Ryan Green
text: I'm in town on business and after asking the hotel concierge where to go, was directed here. Upon walking in you're met with chic decorations, a huge bar with lots of beer options, and the smell of delicious pizza. My coworker and myself ‚Ä¶More

name: Ron Bryan
text: The shiitake pizza is awesome, all the food is very good. And large beer selection, best in town.  It is a little more expensive but worth the extra $$.

name: Danny Decker
text: Food was pretty good, but service was outstanding. Very welcoming and friendly.

name: Greg Vollmer
text: Got there early on a weekday- greeted with a smile and fantastic service. Probably their first pizza of the lunch rush but was fast and hot and tasty. Great experience, highly recommended

name: Vadim Shun
text: Sit down restaurant. Portion sizes were decent and Italian food variety was decent. We had to wait for a while till the order was served despite being off rush hour time.

name: Ruthvik Kadam
text: Great place for a good dinner. Good ambience and customer service. Ordered the buffalo chicken and shiitake pie on thin crust. Enjoyed both. Good collection of beers as well.

name: Paul Hoag
text:
My wife has Alzheimers and she was treated with respect and caring that exceeded my expectations. I can't thank them enough for their caring attitude. Oh yeah, the food was great too.
Paul

text: My favorite pizza place in Blacksburg. It has a nice bar and all the topping you could ever want.

name: Michelle Baker
text: Staff was friendly, good was pretty good

name: Jayy Frost
text: I always enjoy eating here. Buffalo chicken pizza is sublime.

name: Kendra McAllister

text: Good pizza,  long waits,  funky atmosphere, moderately priced but not a bargain for pizza of this quality

name: karin Ben-Zeev
text: Great food and service

name: Mikey Baker
text: Incredible pizza's and the people there are awesome! Yes, you may have a long wait if it's busy, but if you don't realize that, then you probably shouldn't eat out anywhere. üôÑüôÑüôÑ

text: Awesome selection of pizza and adult beverages.   Had the Pacific Rim pizza.  It was delicious!!!

name: Rebecca Scheckler
text: Okay bur expensive. Get better pizza at a better price down the street at the cellar. i do not know why people wait on line to get in.

name: Matthew Mauur

text: I usually eat at the one in Johnson City but I was in town for my birthday and y'all did a great job! Food was delicious!

name: Ciaran M
text: Great service and delicious pizzas

text: Super slow service. Food slow to come out and even slower were the drinks. Nothing special, just draft beer orders. Not sure why. It was not that crowded.

name: Chris Hughey
text: Food was good but the service was really slow. We were there during a slow time and waitress was more interested in talking to the other waitresses vs taking care of us.  Had to get up and ask to place order and for refills and such.

name: Brian Fischer
text: Never been. Was surprised by the quality and quantity for such a reasonable price. Large selection of toppings with plenty of other things to eat if pizza isn't your thing. But pizza is there thing.

name: Tom Schiller
text: Food was good! Service was a little less than friendly but all in all a good experience.

name: Jennifer Acuff

name: Julie Ruiz
text: Delicious pizza! Great selections of beers. Good time.

name: Kyle Engemann
text: Service was a little slow for being relatively quite but once we recieve out food every thing was amazing.

name: Dae Hur
text: Good place to grab a bite to eat. Service was a bit slow though.

name: Stuart Schwarzer
text: Good food and good service!  It's an eclectic kind of place.  Pizzas and sandwiches abound!

name: Vijay Raghavan

name: Jody Buyalos
text: Great food but super SLOW

text: Second time back at Mellow Mushroom and it was awesome again! Despite the busy restaurant the staff is very nice and the food is great! Love the specialty shiitake pie!

name: Robert Tasselmyer

name: Regina Nesiama
text: Great food! Salads were great and the kids enjoyed the burgers and nice atmosphere

name: Mary O'Quinn
text: Delicious veggie pizza

name: John Knaus
text: The mellow mushroom has great pizza and an upgrade atmosphere.  The staff is well trained and friendly.  The decor is amazing.  I recommend a visit, though if you love pizza the cost in your local pizza shop is about half as much.

name: James Jarmusch
text: Always a good place to create your own meal. The menu is eclectic enough to build something for everyone and the food is never disappointing. I am not a pizza guy, but I can always find meal that is good.

name: Mehjabeen Meraj
text: Best pizza ever had in US

name: Samuel Shupe
text: Good food but very long wait.

name: Danielle Kelly
text: Good pizza. Good specials.

name: Jerry Lovell
text: I went with a large group that got split up to seat us all. The poor waiter had to run back and forth to accommodate both groups. Service was awesome.  Thumbs up waiter guy.  And sorry to put you through that.

name: kenneth hancock
text: They have great pizza, and the best pretzel anywhere which goes good with their salads.

name: Matilde Timmins
text: Just one word for the good pizza... Awesome!!The crust to the cheese to the everything!!!

name: William P
text: Save your self the hassle....of course the townies are going to love it, but from a out of towner perspective ...it is average at best!!!! Paid 24.99 for the mushroom pie, at this price you'd expect a couple cans of mushrooms on it, right? ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Tate

text: Great place for lunch. Fun walk through downtown. From parking. My party and I split a few pizzas. Good beer selection, and great decor. Built a pizza w garlic base, mozzarella cheese and steak.

name: NF64

name: Ed Willman

name: A Google User

name: PJL_CEC

name: S. Jones
text: Two words, Maui Wowie. Two more words, that crust. Two even more words, Funky Q. Two more words following two words, Mighty Meaty. Mellow mushrooms pizza is literally one of the best in the US in terms of flavors and their pizza crust. Go eat it.

name: Kayla Marie
text: Amazing pizza! Everyone in my family loved it. Even my picky eaters who won't touch the crust devoured it. Highly recommended!

name: Jake Fox
text: Kids pretzel dippers were dry and burned. Service was very slow and just not competent. Some of our food was good, but a dry sandwich was disappointing. This  was not the first time we've had service trouble at this outlet. Other MM outlets we've been to have always been good.

name: Delinda Hawks
text: This is always the best one. We've eaten at several and this one's the best.

text: Great food. Friendly service. And they don‚Äôt just have good pizza, the burgers and sandwiches I‚Äôve had have all been great. Definitely recommend

name: Kimberly Strong
text: Actually was impressed with the spinach salad ... the pizza was, of course, perfect!

name: Carissa Hogan
text: I've visited multiple Mellow locations and love the food in all of them. This location has a great decor theme with it's industrial yet funky vibe. Our waitress Olivia, who had only been working at this location for a week, was superb - friendly, responsive, and very helpful! Best beer cheese of all the MMs.

name: John Marshall
text: Fast, friendly service. Great pizza. Interesting art. Not crowded when we visited. A great place to bring the family. Noisy children won't be noticed.

name: Ethan Smith

name: Josh Sternfeld
text: The pizza was good. I ordered off of the local favorites. My wait was around 2 hours from the time getting there to the time we actually ate. ‚Ä¶More

name: Natalia Tapia
text: Very nice atmosphere and excellent pizza

name: Elliott VC
text: Very busy place but good service!

name: Carrie DiCarlo
text: The food came out at different times.  Mushroom club was tiny and had one slice ham, one slice bacon, one slice cheese and a few mushrooms.  1* sandwich.  Pizza was good.  I have been to much much better mellow mushrooms.

text: Worst service. I was the only customer at 5pm and nobody came to serve

text: Mellow Mushroom knows how to make an amazing pizza! When I need a pizza fix Mellow Mushroom is the only place in town I trust to deliver quality pizza at a great price!

text: Their pizza is very good, just way overpriced. Better values and tastes elsewhere in Blacksburg.

text: I haven't been to a mellow mushroom in about 10 years so I was excited to be able to visit again. Unfortunately the food quality seems to have dropped. Smaller portions and on the bland side.

text: Service and food delivery gets slower every time. We go back because we do love the pizza and beer selection.

name: gravelroad

name: Brendan O'Keefe
text: Really good pizza, but definitely not worth the price. Trivia Night is every Wednesday, which is really fun and well organized, but that's the only time the price of food is worth it.

name: William Crowe
text: I have no real issue with mellow mushroom, the food is good, service is fine. But it is exceptionally expensive for average high end pizza. I have been to many superior pizza places that served up a large pizza for under 18 dollars. Recommend the spin art dip.

name: Gare Bear
text: Pizza was like an 8/10, but the wait was quite a bit (about an hour), it was loud inside, and we waited about 10 minutes until a waiter came and took our order.

name: james buck
text: Pizza beer and cheesesteak...ourdinnerwas great.  My cheesesteak was good..big place. Lots of tables.  Long bar to wait if place is full

name: CreepyPasta Zach
text: This place as amazing! The food is fantastic and comes relatively quick and hot, plus the service is great. The waiters and waitresses are really nice and apologetic if something goes wrong. I just wished I could get more food for the drive home.

name: MDF
text: Stunning food and beer experiences are possible at this well managed restaurant.

text: Not the best experiences here. We had bad service. The food wasn't hot. No refills. Probably won't be back.

name: Ryan Wickes
text: I love the beer selection here, there's always a good variety of rotating drafts that change all the time. The food is good also, just heavy. Bartenders are usually friendly and overall I'd give it a 4.5 stars, would definitely recommend if you're hungry.

name: Keath Marx
text: 60 beers on tap, need I say more + best Pizza anywhere. Also pretty good and tasty salad selection. My favorite pizza and beer place! A bit expensive, but worth the price.

name: elliott hess
text: Enlightened Spinach Salad and a cold dark beer! Perfect pick-me-up between work life and home-to-the-kids! Great food! Great service! Great Mellow!!! Go. NOW!

name: Diane Rickman
text: Mellow Mushroom is our favorite pizza place and when we're not on vacation and crave some Mellow Mushroom, we drive almost 2 hours from Beckley, WV to get your pizza. It's the best! We always get a large Mighty Meaty and a large Loaded Potato Pie, and of course the selection of beer is phenomenal!

name: Kevin Neil
text: Love the pizza. Great flavorful crust. Great ingredients. Great price. Room booths

name: shane xavier
text: My parents and I went when we visited VT, and they make some of the best pizza I've ever had. I can only think of one other place that makes pizza just as good as theirs, however it's in NY closer to where I live. My parents and I look forward to coming back to eat there again when we visit VT later on.

text: Took over an hour for us to get our food. Our waitress forgot about our beer so that was warm. Saw the waitress maybe twice the whole time ? Horrible do not go.
